feed.title: cpprefjp - C++日本語リファレンス

entry.title: rbegin -- fix some versioning
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/array/array/rbegin.md b/reference/array/array/rbegin.md
index 77c2b18ac..ab54a7b75 100644
--- a/reference/array/array/rbegin.md
+++ b/reference/array/array/rbegin.md
@@ -7,7 +7,7 @@
 
 ```cpp
 reverse_iterator rbegin() noexcept;                       // (1) C++11
-constexpr reverse_iterator rbegin() noexcept;             // (1) C++11
+constexpr reverse_iterator rbegin() noexcept;             // (1) C++17
 
 const_reverse_iterator rbegin() const noexcept;           // (2) C++11
 constexpr const_reverse_iterator rbegin() const noexcept; // (2) C++17

entry.title: operator[] -- fix some versioning
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/bitset/bitset/op_at.md b/reference/bitset/bitset/op_at.md
index e5ee01c9d..8d9b77c01 100644
--- a/reference/bitset/bitset/op_at.md
+++ b/reference/bitset/bitset/op_at.md
@@ -6,8 +6,7 @@
 
 ```cpp
 bool operator[](size_t pos) const;           // (1) C++03
-constexpr bool operator[](size_t pos);       // (1) C++11
-constexpr bool operator[](size_t pos) const; // (1) C++14
+constexpr bool operator[](size_t pos) const; // (1) C++11
 
 reference operator[](size_t pos);            // (2) C++03
 constexpr reference operator[](size_t pos);  // (2) C++23

entry.title: compare -- fix some versioning
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/string/basic_string/compare.md b/reference/string/basic_string/compare.md
index 0b0edf7b6..d3240d4c3 100644
--- a/reference/string/basic_string/compare.md
+++ b/reference/string/basic_string/compare.md
@@ -38,7 +38,7 @@ constexpr int
           size_type n2 = npos) const; // (3) C++20
 
 int compare(const charT* s) const;           // (4) C++03
-constexpr int compare(const charT* s) const; // (4) C++03
+constexpr int compare(const charT* s) const; // (4) C++20
 
 int
   compare(size_type pos1,

entry.title: operator+= -- fix some versioning
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/string/basic_string/op_plus_assign.md b/reference/string/basic_string/op_plus_assign.md
index 898c79782..7f5dbb1ff 100644
--- a/reference/string/basic_string/op_plus_assign.md
+++ b/reference/string/basic_string/op_plus_assign.md
@@ -12,7 +12,7 @@ basic_string& operator+=(const charT* s);           // (2) C++03
 constexpr basic_string& operator+=(const charT* s); // (2) C++20
 
 basic_string& operator+=(charT c);           // (3) C++03
-constexpr basic_string& operator+=(charT c); // (3) C++03
+constexpr basic_string& operator+=(charT c); // (3) C++20
 
 basic_string& operator+=(initializer_list<charT> il);           // (4) C++11
 constexpr basic_string& operator+=(initializer_list<charT> il); // (4) C++20

entry.title: back -- fix some versioning
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/vector/vector/back.md b/reference/vector/vector/back.md
index 54c5b4f6d..1bb42f8e2 100644
--- a/reference/vector/vector/back.md
+++ b/reference/vector/vector/back.md
@@ -6,10 +6,10 @@
 
 ```cpp
 reference back();                       // (1) C++03
-constexpr reference back();             // (1) C++03
+constexpr reference back();             // (1) C++20
 
 const_reference back() const;           // (2) C++03
-constexpr const_reference back() const; // (2) C++03
+constexpr const_reference back() const; // (2) C++20
 ```
 
 ## 概要

entry.title: resize -- fix some versioning
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/vector/vector/resize.md b/reference/vector/vector/resize.md
index b9f19ccc9..5a6d19c4d 100644
--- a/reference/vector/vector/resize.md
+++ b/reference/vector/vector/resize.md
@@ -9,7 +9,7 @@ void resize(size_type sz);                       // (1) C++11
 constexpr void resize(size_type sz);             // (1) C++20
 
 void resize(size_type sz, const T& c);           // (2) C++11
-constexpr void resize(size_type sz, const T& c); // (2) C++11
+constexpr void resize(size_type sz, const T& c); // (2) C++20
 
 void resize(size_type sz, T c = T()); // (1) + (2) C++03
 ```

entry.title: count -- fix again samples of std::set
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/set/set/count.md b/reference/set/set/count.md
index a9aae4791..69e0cc700 100644
--- a/reference/set/set/count.md
+++ b/reference/set/set/count.md
@@ -67,8 +67,8 @@ int main()
 
 ### 出力
 ```
-2
-2
+1
+1
 ```
 
 ## 関連項目

+++ b/reference/set/set/lower_bound.md

entry.title: operator<=> -- remove unnecessaly characters
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/optional/optional/op_compare_3way.md b/reference/optional/optional/op_compare_3way.md
index a29b52666..139816117 100644
--- a/reference/optional/optional/op_compare_3way.md
+++ b/reference/optional/optional/op_compare_3way.md
@@ -35,7 +35,7 @@ namespace std {
 
 - (2) :
     ```cpp
-    ```return bool(x) <=> false;`
+    return bool(x) <=> false;
     ```
 
 - (3) : 以下と等価

entry.title: cdata -- fix some typo in ranges sample
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/ranges/cdata.md b/reference/ranges/cdata.md
index cb9b063b9..34ca0ed78 100644
--- a/reference/ranges/cdata.md
+++ b/reference/ranges/cdata.md
@@ -52,13 +52,10 @@ int main()
 * std::ranges::cdata[color ff0000]
 * std::ranges::size[link size.md]
 
-### 出力
+### 出力例
 ```
-false
-false
-true
-false
-false
+array size:4 at 0x7fffb1ad5d70
+array size:1 at 0x556ec23ba2b0
 ```
 
 ## バージョン

   });
 }
 ```

-* std::ranges::cend[link cend.md]

 ```

entry.title: operator== -- fix that notes on correct place
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/bitset/bitset/op_equal.md b/reference/bitset/bitset/op_equal.md
index d8574f78d..675ed0c7b 100644
--- a/reference/bitset/bitset/op_equal.md
+++ b/reference/bitset/bitset/op_equal.md
@@ -22,6 +22,10 @@ constexpr bool operator==(const bitset<N>& rhs) const noexcept; // (1) C++23
 投げない。
 
 
+## 備考
+- この演算子により、`operator!=`が使用可能になる (C++20)
+
+
 ## 例
 ```cpp example
 #include <iostream>

entry.title: operator!= -- fix that notes on correct place
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/bitset/bitset/op_not_equal.md b/reference/bitset/bitset/op_not_equal.md
index c2b8e152f..df548f1c5 100644
--- a/reference/bitset/bitset/op_not_equal.md
+++ b/reference/bitset/bitset/op_not_equal.md
@@ -23,10 +23,6 @@ constexpr bool operator!=(const bitset<N>& rhs) const noexcept; // (1) C++23
 投げない。
 
 
-## 備考
-- この演算子により、`operator!=`が使用可能になる (C++20)
-
-
 ## 例
 ```cpp example
 #include <iostream>
